personal.intro:
Victor Leung - VL | myworldbox

HKUST - Computer Engineering

As a fervent enthusiast of the intricate fields of full-stack development and algorithmic trading, I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering at the esteemed HKUST. With an ardent desire to excel in my chosen career path, I am wholeheartedly compelled to pursue this opportunity with unwavering dedication.

My portfolio of accomplishments as a full-stack developer includes noteworthy contributions to reputable associations such as AWS Educate, HKUST Path Advisor, HKUST Poker Society, and USThing, all of which are considered among the most influential academic institutions.

project.title: myworldbox
project.hint:
May 2016 - Oct 2019

- Temporary ranked no.1 hottest game in the Gamelet dashboard in 2016, 2018, and 2019

- Chaining game actions into multi-dimensional arrays to provide an RPG-like editor with map retrieval functionality

- Ad-hoc Minecraft creator mode cloning inside Gamelet with (.twf) format
